survey_name: Urban Bike Share Program User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of urban bike share programs to assess satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and explore opportunities for improvement in service quality and accessibility.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the urban bike share program?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Randomize options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the urban bike share program?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using the bike share program?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents except those who selected 'This is my first time' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with an optional open-text follow-up (SINGLE_CHOICE).

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your preferred stations?

questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Randomize scale direction to reduce bias.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike share program?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open text (OPEN_TEXT). Include character counter.
